classic.name: Cattedrale di Monreale
classic.description: Landmark Norman cathedral known for its ornate cloisters & bright gold mosaics of biblical stories.
classic.address: Piazza Guglielmo II, 90046 Monreale PA, Italy

classic.name: Church of Jesus of Casa Professa
classic.description: Prominent baroque-style church completed in the 1630s with frescoes & many bas-relief sculptures.
classic.address: Piazza Casa Professa, 21, 90134 Palermo PA, Italy

classic.name: Palermo Cathedral
classic.description: 4 bell towers top this architecturally diverse church dating from the 1100s & housing royal tombs.
classic.address: Via Vittorio Emanuele, 490, 90134 Palermo PA, Italy

classic.name: Royal Palace and Palatine Chapel
classic.description: Ancient chapel in the Palazzo dei Normanni known for its elaborate Byzantine mosaics & paintings.

classic.name: Quattro Canti

classic.name: Fontana Pretoria
classic.description: Landmark 1500s fountain known for its ornate, tiered design & nude statues of mythological figures.

classic.name: Porta Nuova
classic.description: Landmark triumphal arch & gateway built in 1570 & standing at 43 meters high, with Moorish statues.
classic.address: Via Vittorio Emanuele, 475, 90134 Palermo PA, Italy

classic.name: Porta Felice
classic.description: Former city gates decorated with colonnades, balconies & loggias in Renaissance & baroque styles.
